# Examples

```{r}
N <- 100
set.seed(909)
height <- rnorm(N, 10, 2)
leg_prop <- runif(N, 0.4, 0.5)
leg_left <- leg_prop*height + rnorm(N, 0, 0.02)
leg_right <- leg_prop*height + rnorm(N, 0, 0.02)
d <- data.frame(height, leg_left, leg_right)

m6.1 <- quap(
  alist(
    height ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- a + bl * leg_left +  br * leg_right,
    a <- dnorm(10, 100),
    bl <- dnorm(2, 10),
    br <- dnorm(2, 10),
    sigma <- dexp(1)
  ), data=d)

precis(m6.1)
plot(precis(m6.1))
```

# Daggity Example

```{r}
g1 <- dagitty( "dag {
    H_0 -> H_1
    H_0 -> T
    F -> H_1
    T -> F
}")

plot(graphLayout(g1))
```

```{r}
impliedConditionalIndependencies( g1 )
```

```{r}
adjustmentSets(g1, exposure="T", outcome="H_1")
```

# Simple Model

```{r}
N <- 1e3
U <- rnorm(N, 1, 2)
X <- rnorm(N, 2*U)
Y <- rnorm(N, -U)

d <- data.frame(U, X, Y, Z = X+Y)
pairs(d)
precis(d)
```

```{r}
d %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=everything(), names_to = "var") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(value, colour=var))
```
```{r}
# Standardize
d1 <- data.frame(X = standardize(d$X),
                 Y = standardize(d$Y),
                 Z = standardize(d$Z))

d1 %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=everything(), names_to = "var") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(value, colour=var))

pairs(d1)
```

```{r}
g2 <- dagitty( "dag {
              X <- U -> Y
              X -> Z
              Y -> Z
              }")

plot(graphLayout(g2))
```

```{r}
Xbar <- mean(X)

m1 <- quap(
  alist(
    Z ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu ~ alpha + beta * X,
    alpha ~ dnorm(0,1),
    beta ~ dnorm(0,1),
    sigma ~ dexp(0.5)
  ),
  data=d1)

precis(m1)
```

```{r}
Ybar <- mean(Y)

m2 <- quap(
  alist(
    Z ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu ~ alpha + beta * Y,
    alpha ~ dnorm(0,1),
    beta ~ dnorm(0, 1),
    sigma ~ dexp(0.5)
  ),
  data=d1)

precis(m2)
```

```{r}

m3 <- quap(
  alist(
    Z ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu ~ alpha + beta1 * X + beta2 * Y,
    alpha ~ dnorm(0,0.5),
    beta1 ~ dnorm(0,1),
    beta2 ~ dnorm(0,1),
    sigma ~ dexp(1)
  ),
  data=d1)

precis(m3)
```

```{r}
mdl1 <- lm(Z ~ X + Y, data=d)
summary(mdl1)
plot(mdl1)
```

```{r}
Z_hat <- fitted(mdl1)
d$Z_hat <- d$X + d$Y
plot(d$Z, Z_hat)
points(d$Z, d$Z_hat, col="red")
```

```{r}
predict(mdl1, interval="confidence")
```
